Title: Alvarez hat-trick helps Atletico edge Rayo thriller
Summary: Julian Alvarez scored a hat-trick to snatch Atletico Madrid a thrilling 3-2 win over Rayo Vallecano in La Liga . The Rojiblancos fell behind in the 78th minute but Alvarez struck twice more in the second half .

Title: 6.2-magnitude quake shakes west Venezuela
Summary: A 6.2-magnitude quake shook west and north Venezuela including the capital Caracas . There were no immediate reports of major damage, according to the government . According to the USGS, the epicenter of the quake was the capital .

Title: Israeli strike kills 11 Palestinians: Gaza civil defence
Summary: Israeli air strike on a home where displaced people had taken refuge in central Gaza killed at least 11 people . Israel has intensified its offensive on the devastated Palestinian territory .

Title: Strike on market in Sudan’s El-Fasher kills 15 people
Summary: Strike on market in Sudan's besieged city of El-Fasher kills 15 people, a medical worker at the local hospital said . The Tuesday strike “killed 15 citizens and wounded 12, three of them critically”, the worker said .

Title: Women protesters in Serbia face vicious abuse and shaming
Summary: Women on the frontline of months of Serbian anti-government protests say they have been the target of violent retribution and vicious online smear campaigns . When Nikolina Sindjelic accused a police officer of assaulting and threatening to rape her, explicit images were posted online .

Title: Fubara: Governor only in name
Summary: Siminalayi Fubara served out a six-month suspension slammed on him by the headmaster of Nigeria’s democracy, President Bola Tinubu, and his class captain, Ezenwo Nyesom Wike, Minister of the Federal Capital Territory, FCT .

Title: Two-storey building collapses in Lagos, one injured, five rescued
Summary: Two-storey building collapsed on Wednesday evening at 4 Modupeola Street, Mangoro Bus Stop, Alimosho area of Lagos State . One person was injured while five others were rescued .

Title: POCO Launches Two Power-Packed Smartphones in Nigeria: POCO M7 and POCO C85
Summary: POCO, a performance-driven smartphone brand loved by young tech enthusiasts worldwide, today announced the arrival of two exciting new models for the Nigerian market . The PocO M7 and POCC C85 are the latest in a series of high-powered smartphones .

Title: Naira rises to N1,515/$ in parallel market
Summary: The Naira yesterday appreciated to N1,515 per dollar in the parallel market from N1.518 per dollar on Tuesday . The exchange rate for the Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) Data published by the Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN, showed that the exchange rates for the naira fell to .

Title: Flood submerges 5 communities in Kogi
Summary: Executive Secretary of Kogi State Emergency Management Agency, Mouktar Atima, has said floods have completely submerged Ibaji Local Government Area of the state . He warned communities along the river bank to immediately relocate to safer grounds . As state opens 42 IDP camps, SEMA boss led the emergency response team .
